app_detail:
ğŸ‰This is an Android keyboard that serves more than typingğŸ‰

ğŸ‰This is a stylish input method that personalizes your phoneğŸ‰

ğŸ”¥Redefine your typing experience in every aspect possible!ğŸ”¥

ğŸ”¥Refresh your keyboard style with this Lighting Flash Keyboard Keyboard Theme for FREE!ğŸ”¥

Lighting Flash Keyboard is a fantastic keyboard theme with purple background. This beautiful keyboard is designed for people who like Lighting. Download for free and apply this keyboard theme called Lighting Flash Keyboard. Lighting Flash Keyboard is designed to give you a faster and smoother mobile keyboard experience. Download this Lighting Flash Keyboard keyboard theme and type more efficiently than ever.ğŸš€

Lighting Flash Keyboard will also turn a plain keyboard into a pretty and unique one. Your keyboard looks totally different with Lighting Flash Keyboard. Download Lighting Flash Keyboard theme and try it out!ğŸš€

ğŸ†Main Features and Functions:ğŸ†

âœ…Cloud Prediction:âœ…
Typing more efficiently with cloud data powered prediction function to accurately predict your input.

â°Gesture Typing:â°
Instead of typing one letter a time, just swipe through letters to enjoy easier typing.

ğŸ¤–Smart Reply:ğŸ¤–
Response Suggestions will work based on the messages you received, allowing you to stay close to AI and benefit from Smart Reply.
ğŸ”Smart Search:ğŸ”
No need to switch apps. Tapping the Search feature will direct you to search for whatever information you want.

ğŸ¨Beautiful Themes:ğŸ¨
Themes of various styles including cute, cool, tech and luxury ones, etc. There will always be one for you.

ğŸ­DIY Themes:ğŸ­
By selecting wallpapers, buttons, fonts, music and animation effects, you can create your unique themes on your own.
ğŸ’¡Clipboard Function:ğŸ’¡
Cut your input for a quick paste. It is fast and convenient.

ğŸ˜‚Stylish Emojis:ğŸ˜‚
Thousands of emojis and EmojiOne smileys are provided, adding much fun to your typing.

ğŸ‘¯Plenty of GIFs:ğŸ‘¯
Various trendy GIFs are available. Searching for GIFs is supported as well.

ğŸ’¯3D Keyboard:ğŸ’¯
Being the first authentic 3D Android keyboard app on the Google Play Store, our keyboard makes your typing incredibly dazzling.

ğŸ˜—Languages Supported:ğŸ˜—
Lighting Flash Keyboard keyboard theme supports 85 different languages covering 138 different countries.

â­How to get Lighting Flash Keyboard keyboard theme input method?â­
1) Download Lighting Flash Keyboard keyboard theme and click the INSTALL button.
2) Download our keyboard app from the Google Play Store.
3) With our keyboard installed and applied, Lighting Flash Keyboard theme will be automatically installed on your phone.

You do not want to miss this excellent fashionable input method. Download our keyboard for FREE NOW and enjoy!ğŸ’–
